plugins.name: Drafta

plugins.name: Rename Variables, Collections & Styles
plugins.description:
Easily edit variable and collection names without clicking multiple buttons in variable editor


Editing variables in the variables popup dialog is complex, because

  1. You need to double click each name to start editing the name
  2. If you type a variable name that already exists, and press return, you get a error and loose whatever you typed


Renaming any collection needs 3 steps

  1. select collection from dropdown
  2. click open the dot menu
  3. click rename.

This becomes frustrating when you have to rename multiple collections.
plugins.tagline: Easily edit variable and collection names without clicking multiple buttons in variable editor

plugins.name: Tidy Guide (Beta)
plugins.description:
Wasting time on manual documentation creation?


Efficient way to share your design system with your team


Tidy Guide - our new plugin that will help you build design system documentation quickly and easily - inside Figma!


Within minutes you will have comprehensive and up-to-date documentation of your design system.


Tidy Guide was born out of a deep understanding of the need for UX designers to have an efficient and easy-to-use solution for creating documentation.


Tidy Guide helps with:

  • Automatic creation of comprehensive and up-to-date documentation.
  • A trusted source of dynamic documentation
  • Eliminating the need to create every documentation manually.
  • Sharing your design system with your team and stakeholders
  • Maintaining consistency and high-quality design


Here are some examples of how to use Tidy Guide:


System Designers:

Use Tidy Guide to create up-to-date documentation of your design system. Then, share the documentation with the rest of the team.


Editors in Figma:

Use Tidy Guide to view the design system documentation and learn how to use the different components.


Product Managers:

Use Tidy Guide to better understand the design system and make informed decisions about product development.


Significant time savings, allowing you to focus on creative work.


Try Tidy and see for yourself how it can save you time and effort!


For additional information and a closer look at Tidy, check out our website: https://tidy.guide/
plugins.tagline: Internal documentation your team can finally trust

plugins.name: CreatoCode Figma to Code: ArtUI,ArtTS,iOS(Objective-C), React Native(Flexbox),HarmonyOS
plugins.description:
Currently only supports React Native, iOS, HarmonyOS ArtUI ArtTS


  1. Layout with Flexbox
  2. Supports component type conversion: can convert images, text into buttons, input fields, etc., to generate button or input field components.
  3. When exporting code, it supports directly exporting images and batch importing images into the project.
  4. Automatically recognizes images to be exported: can adjust the images to be exported based on the distance between design elements to improve accuracy; or manually export without selecting "auto recognize images".
  5. The generated code can use custom components: as the platform only extracts necessary parameters to initialize components, you can use custom components by simply modifying the initialization function implementation.
plugins.tagline: Generate code with one click.

plugins.name: Batch Variable Customizer
plugins.description:
Batch update variables with ease — across local and external libraries!


Effortlessly update multiple variables, including colors, aliases, or names, without the hassle of editing each one individually. This plugin streamlines variable management, allowing you to update color values, manage aliases, and rename entries seamlessly—whether you're working with local collections or external libraries. Handle updates, deletions, and renaming in just a few clicks, regardless of the scale or complexity of your variables.


Features:

  1. Batch update color variables for both local and external libraries.
  2. Effortlessly rename multiple variables to maintain consistent naming conventions.
  3. Bulk delete variables for quick and efficient cleanup.


Braces notation for aliasing:

  1. For local libraries: {collectionName.variableName}
  2. For external libraries: {LibraryName/collectionName.variableName}

Use the / suggestion box to quickly browse and select variables from your libraries, ensuring precise and consistent aliasing.


Huge thanks to Jan Six for creating the Batch Styler plugin, which inspired this tool; currently supporting color variables, with plans to expand to other variable types in the future!


Limitations:

Due to Figma API constraints, updates to external libraries (such as changes to variable names, new collections, or modes) will not be automatically reflected in the plugin. To capture such updates, simply reload the Figma file, and the plugin will synchronize with the latest changes.


Questions & Support

This plugin is still a baby panda, so if you notice any bugs or have any questions, please get in touch directly. I'll help you troubleshoot and resolve any issues as quickly as possible.
plugins.tagline: Batch update, rename, and delete variables effortlessly, including colors and aliases.

plugins.name: Concord
plugins.description:
About Concord

Concord, a game-changing Figma plugin that revolutionizes workflows by seamlessly bridging the gap between design and development.


Concord empowers teams with automation, efficiency, and flawless precision, transforming the way designers and developers collaborate. With Concord, you can streamline your processes, ensuring smoother handoffs and accelerated project timelines.


Features


1. HandOff


-> Component Breakdown:

Easily dissect design components into granular layers, providing detailed insights into each cosmetic property such as color, border, and radius.


-> Master Component Identification:

Identify master components and exclude them from handoff by default, with the option to include them as needed.


-> Tokens Values Integration:

Seamlessly integrate tokens from Token Studio into the handoff process, facilitating efficient communication of UI element properties.


-> Style Values Generation:

Generate style values for design elements, providing clear insights into applied styles and attributes.


-> Variable Values Generation:

Automatically generate variable values for design elements, enabling dynamic customization and adaptability.


-> Raw Value Generation:

Automatically generate raw values or parameters defining design element characteristics.


-> Update HandOff:

Update previous handoffs effortlessly by selecting and running the plugin for specific screens or elements.


-> Generate HandOff for All Artboards:

Generate handoff for all artboards on the page with just a single click, streamlining the process and saving valuable time for designers and developers.


2. Variant Generation

Empower your workflow with the capability to produce variants for designated components, ensuring thorough documentation coverage.


3. Analytics View - Coming Soon!


4. Lint Check - Coming Soon!


Experience the power of Concord as it enhances your Figma workflow, making collaboration effortless and results impeccable. Download Concord today and elevate your design and development journey to new heights.


Credit:

Designer -> Alpesh Karanpuria

Developer -> Sachin Kumar

Developer -> Omkar Sabade
plugins.tagline: Bridge The Design Gap

plugins.name: Style Audit for Text Nodes (CSV Export)
plugins.description:
Have you found it difficult finding out what styles you or your designers are using? Are these from a local library or a remote library? How many text nodes are styled and how many pending?


This plugin is for you if you need a CSV export of Text Style names and Fill Style names for all text nodes within the current page.


Feel free to request features.


Plan to add the following features:


  1. Text Node details like font size, line height, etc.
  2. Simple charts to show % of library use (Local vs Remote)


This is an open source project. Feel free to contribute by forking the Figma Text Style Audit Repo.

plugins.name: Layer Name Styles
plugins.description:
Layer Name Styles


You can use this plugin to apply styles written in layer names so you don't have to go back and forth between the left and right sidebar.

You can write style snippets in a simplified Emmet-like notation.


How to use


  1. write a style snippet by enclosing it with "[]" in the layer name. If there are multiple snippets, separate them with a space.　For example, "Layer name [w200 h300]".
  2. Select the layer to which you want to apply the style (if not selected, all the top layers will be applied).
  3. Press the "Apply" button.


Example of how to write layer names


Articles [lm:h sp:20 p20-40 x20]


  • Interpret the contents of "[]". You can write anything outside of "[]".
  • When writing multiple styles, separate them with a "space".
  • The order in which they are written does not matter.
  • If the target property duplicates in multiple styles, it will be overwritten by the later written style.


Setting items


Exclude child layers

Turn "ON" to include only parent layers and exclude child layers.


Include locked layers

Turn "ON" to include locked layers.


Apply at plugin activation

Turn "ON" to apply at plugin activation.


There is no setting to add shortcut keys to the Figma application, although it would be useful in combination with shortcut keys.

If you are a Mac user, you can add shortcuts in the following way.

see: Customize Figma shortcut keys


Ignore bracket

Turn "ON" to to ignore bracket.

If you turn this "ON", be careful not to duplicate layer names and style snippets.


Documentation


Properties and Values

Styles have "properties" and "values.

If you write "w200", "w" is the property for width and "200" is the value you want to set for width.


Ambiguous Writing

Style snippets do not have to be written with strict rules to be interpreted.

For example, these all mean the same thing:

"w200", "w-200", "w:200"


Style snippets (Common)


x (X-coordinate)

[x20]
//x:20


y (Y-coordinate)

[y20]
//y:20


w (Width)

[w200]
//width: 200

variations

[w200]
[width200]


h (Height)

[h300]
//height: 300

variations

[h300]
[height300]


Style snippets (Frame only)


lm (Layout Mode)

[lm:h]
//Layout Mode: "HORIZONTAL"

[lm:v]
//Layout Mode: "VERTICAL"

variations

//HORIZONTAL
[lm:h]
[col]

//VERTICAL
[lm:v]
[row]


sp (Item Spacing)

[sp40]
//Item Spacing: 40

[sp:a]
//This is a special specification.
//The spacing mode is "SPACE BETWEEN".

variations

[sp40]
[g40]


p (Padding)

[p20]
//Padding
//top & bottom & left & right: 20

[p20-40]
//Padding
//top & bottom: 20, left & right: 40

[p20-40-20]
//Padding
//top: 20, left & right: 40, bottom: 20

[p20-40-20-40]
//Padding
//top: 20, right: 40, bottom: 20, left: 40


px (Padding-Left, Padding-Right)

[px20]


py (Padding-Top, Padding-Bottom)

[py20]


pt (Padding-Top)

[pt20]


pb (Padding-Bottom)

[pb20]


pl (Padding-Left)

[pl20]


pr (Padding-Right)

[pr20]
plugins.tagline: You can apply styles written in layer names (with Emmet-like notation)

plugins.name: Liquid Glass Converter
plugins.description:
Simply select any frame or rectangle and click "Create Liquid Glass" to generate both variants.


Transform any frame or rectangle into beautiful glass buttons using Apple's latest WWDC 25 Liquid Glass material specification. This plugin generates two button variants:


  1. Complex Button: Closest to Apple's multi-layer glass effect perfect for hero CTAs and premium interfaces, but not well scalable.
  2. Simple Button: Single-layer glass effect with shadows, background blur, and auto layout text - ideal for secondary actions and scalable designs.



Built with love for the design community ☕
plugins.tagline: Create stunning glass effects like the Apple's WWDC 26 Liquid Glass material design effects

plugins.name: Figma to Creght
plugins.description:
Export Figma to Creght

Copy, paste, and publish. Export your Figma designs by simply copying what's on the canvas and pasting it in Creght. This Figma to Creght plugin takes care of adapting your design to Creght’s layout tools in real time, so you can focus solely on making a great website.


How to use this plugin:

  1. Install the Free Figma plugin
  2. Copy your Figma designs
  3. Paste in Creght


How to better adapt responsive layouts:

  1. Always utilize Auto Layout whenever possible
  2. Prefer Fill/Hug over fixed dimensions for width/height


For more details, please visit https://www.creght.com/figma2creght


免费导出Figma 设计稿至 Creght

三步发布：复制 → 粘贴 → 上线

通过本插件导出 Figma 设计时，仅需复制画布内容并粘贴至 Creght，系统将实时自动适配Creght布局工具，让您专注核心网站设计。


使用插件

1. 安装免费插件

2. 复制设计稿

3. 粘贴至 Creght


如何更好的适配响应式布局：

  1. 尽量使用自动布局
  2. 宽度高度尽量使用Fill/ Hug，而不是固定尺寸


更多详情请查看 https://www.creght.com/figma2creght
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma Designs into Creght. Seamlessly.

plugins.name: Ordered Fill
plugins.description:
This plugin finds all selected, filled elements (shapes, frames, groups, text layers, etc) and their nested children and applies your defined color styles in a repeating order.


Elements are filled from left to right, top to bottom using the center of the element as the axis point. Automatically skips over any elements with an image or video fill, or elements without a fill present.


Note: To manually tag elements you don't want filled, include an asterisk (*) in the layer name.


Open-sourced on Github:

https://github.com/kylielacour/Ordered-Fill

accepted.name: Kylie LaCour
accepted.description: Enthusiast of elegant digital systems, dedicated advocate of fluid responsive design, and novice creator of plugins.

plugins.tagline: Easily fills all selected elements with colors from your palette in a repeating order.

plugins.name: EventStorming Visualizer
plugins.description:
Unlock the power of EventStorming directly within Figjam!


EventStorming Visualizer seamlessly integrates the practices of EventStorming, helping teams to collaboratively explore complex business domains. With automatic scanning of stickies, intelligent connectors, and real-time visualization, this plugin streamlines your domain-driven design process.


Quick Start Guide:

  1. Platform Selection: Ensure you're on the FigJam platform, as our plugin leverages components exclusive to FigJam.
  2. Initiating with Sticky: Manually drag a sticky onto the canvas. The plugin is optimized to detect yellow, blue, or purple stickies. For beginners, we recommend starting with a yellow sticky, representing an event, as event stickies are frequently used.
  3. Sticky Functionality: Different stickies have unique UI buttons that allow them to perform various tasks.
  4. Building Relationships: Drag and connect various stickies using connectors. Our plugin will automatically document the relationships between each sticky for you.
  5. Exporting Your Work: Once you've completed the event storming process, easily export your data through the UI when no selection is made.


Features:

  1. Auto-Scan Stickies: Automatically identifies and categorizes sticky notes based on their properties, ensuring your EventStorming sessions remain organized.
  2. Intelligent Connectors: Builds relationships between stickies with smart connector logic, enhancing clarity in your domain events, policies, and actions.
  3. Collaborative Highlighting: With multi-user support, track parent-child relationships across the canvas, ensuring synchronous understanding within your team.
  4. Real-time Updates: Ensures everyone is on the same page with synchronized state updates, promoting collaborative efficiency.
  5. Intuitive Message Bus System: Easily publish and subscribe to domain events, furthering your EventStorming expertise.


Harness the combined power of Figma and EventStorming with this essential tool. Perfect for domain-driven design enthusiasts, enterprise architects, and teams looking to drive clarity in complex projects.
plugins.tagline: A FigJam Plugin for Organizing Event Storming Workshops

plugins.name: Export Exterminator
plugins.description:
Use this plugin to quickly remove all exports nested inside other exports.


Bulk exporting in Figma can be a real timesaver. But when your document gets to a certain size and complexity, there's likely to be unwanted exports hiding in the depths of your document.


Tracking down all the nested exports manually is a real chore, and that's where this plugin comes in handy. Export Exterminator removes all exports within another export, leaving you with only the top level ones you’ve carefully prepared.


This is how to use it:


  1. Make sure you’ve installed the plugin 😛
  2. Go to Plugins -> Export Exterminator OR search for Export Exterminator from the Quick Actions menu.
  3. Once you’ve pressed it, a notification will appear with your results, e.g. “4 exports removed”.
  4. That’s it. Run it on any page you’d like to sweep clean of nested exports.


Good to know:


  • Changes are applied to the current page.
  • There is no warning/confirmation before the Exterminator does its thing.
plugins.tagline: Get rid of exports within exports

MacroNow! is an innovative plugin designed to revolutionize your workflow in Figma by providing robust automation capabilities. Tailored for designers and teams, this plugin allows you to seamlessly record and recreate any series of actions within Figma, significantly boosting efficiency and productivity.


Key Features:

Macro Recording: Effortlessly capture any sequence of actions you perform in Figma with the intuitive macro recording feature. Whether you're aligning elements, setting styles, or navigating complex menus, MacroNow! ensures every step is meticulously documented.


Play Macro: Recreate your recorded actions with a single click using the Play Macro button. This feature allows you to automate repetitive tasks, ensuring consistency and saving valuable time.


User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, MacroNow! offers an easy-to-use interface that integrates smoothly into your Figma workspace. Begin recording and playing macros without a steep learning curve.


Early Stage Functionality: As an early-stage plugin, MacroNow! is continuously evolving. We are committed to expanding its features based on user feedback, ensuring it meets the dynamic needs of the Figma community.


Benefits:

Enhanced Productivity: Automate routine tasks to focus on creativity and innovation.

Consistency and Precision: Ensure that repetitive actions are performed accurately every time.

Time-Saving: Reduce the time spent on manual, repetitive tasks, allowing for more efficient project completion.

MacroNow! is the perfect companion for any Figma user looking to streamline their design process through powerful automation. Join us in this early stage and help shape the future of design automation with your valuable feedback.

plugins.name: Wantedly Preflight
plugins.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ― You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ― Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ― Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

plugins.name: Variables Exporter For Dev Mode
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to extract a comprehensive JSON representation of all the variables used within a Figma document. This JSON output can serve as a foundation for transforming design variables into cross-platform design tokens—for example, generating Tailwind CSS classes or integrating them into a design token pipeline like Style Dictionary.


The exported format is intentionally rich and flexible, enabling developers to write custom scripts or transformations as needed. However, the plugin also offers two configuration options that reduce the need for manual preprocessing—saving time and making integration into developer workflows more seamless:


Resolve Aliases


When enabled, this option resolves all aliases to their final, underlying values. The plugin supports cascading resolution, meaning it can follow chains of aliases until it reaches a concrete value.


A key feature here is the smart handling of multi-mode variable collections. If variables are connected through multi-mode collections, the plugin attempts to match modes based on slugified mode names. If no match is found, the target collection’s default mode is used instead.


Importantly, the resolution is always based on the original mode name—not the fallback.


Example:


The variable primary in the light mode of the semantics collection points to the variable blue in the primitives collection (which only contains the dark mode). That variable in turn points to blue-500 in the palettes collection, which contains both light and dark modes. In this case, resolution ultimately lands on blue-500 in the light mode, even though the intermediate blue variable belongs to a dark-only collection.


Exclude Hidden Variables


This option filters out any variables that have the "Hide from publishing" checkbox enabled in Figma.


When aliases are involved, any variable pointing to a hidden variable will still follow the alias resolution rules described above. This ensures that the exported JSON always contains usable and resolved values, even if some variables are marked as hidden in the Figma UI.
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to JSON-based format

plugins.name: Vitality AI
plugins.description:
Introducing Vitality AI – a Figma plugin revolutionizing design creation! Generate stunning designs effortlessly with just a prompt description. From accordions to sliders, Vitality AI crafts various components to meet your design needs.


Using Vitality AI is a breeze. Simply run the plugin, wait for it to load, then describe your design and click generate. Avoid clicking elsewhere to prevent interference during the design process. Once generated, import your design into Figma with the click of a button. Need inspiration? Hit the randomize button for fresh prompts. Plus, customize import locations using the x and y coordinates.


Note: To use the plugin, users need to create a free Vitality AI account here.


Encounter an error? No worries! The plugin will notify you, or simply restart for a seamless experience. With Vitality AI, design innovation is at your fingertips.


Vitality AI includes the following components:

  1. Accordion
  2. Alert
  3. Avatar
  4. Badge
  5. Button
  6. Calendar NEW
  7. Card
  8. Checkbox
  9. Input
  10. Label
  11. Progress
  12. Radio group
  13. Select
  14. Separator

  16. Slider

  18. Tabs

plugins.name: 中文文本样式替换 CN Auto Adapt Helper
plugins.description:
介绍

CN Auto Adapt Helper 是一款支持 Figma 中文与英文文本样式一键切换的插件，助力跨语言界面设计快速适配。


功能说明

  1. 自动识别英文样式并替换为中文样式
  2. 支持单行与多行文本样式替换
  3. 保持原有文本结构与排版不变
  4. 一键切换中文/英文模式，操作可逆
  5. 实时显示处理统计和失败信息


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个包含文本样式的图层或组件
  2. 点击“切换中文模式”或“切换英文模式”按钮
  3. 插件将自动完成样式匹配与替换
  4. 处理结果将在底部统计区域展示


注意事项

  1. 仅对存在样式 ID 的文本图层生效
  2. 样式命名需符合设计规范中中英命名映射关系
  3. 若未匹配成功则可能跳过或统计为失败项


Introduction

CN Auto Adapt Helper helps you automatically switch between English and Chinese text styles in Figma, streamlining multilingual UI design.


Function Description

  1. Automatically replaces text styles based on language mode
  2. Supports both single and multi-line styles
  3. Keeps text structure and layout unchanged
  4. One-click toggle between CN and EN modes
  5. Real-time processing stats and error tracking


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text layers or components.
  2. Click “Switch to Chinese Mode” or “Switch to English Mode”.
  3. Plugin will automatically match and replace the corresponding text styles.
  4. View results in the statistics panel.


Notes

  1. Only works when text layers have recognized style IDs.
  2. Style name mappings must align with your design system’s naming convention.
  3. Fallback may occur if the style ID is missing or not matched.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Auto-swap text styles between CN and EN modes

plugins.name: 귀여운 랜덤 닉네임 생성기 Cute nickname maker
plugins.description:
귀여운 닉네임 메이커!


✨ 이제 닉네임 고민은 끝!

이 플러그인은

사용자가 원하는 닉네임 개수, 글자 수,

그리고 사용할 단어를 선택하면,

톡톡 튀는 닉네임을 바로 생성해드려요!(어메이징)

다양한 옵션으로 창의적이고 재밌는 결과물을 만들어보세요!



🌟 주요 기능:

  1. 새로운 텍스트 생성 또는 기존 텍스트 변경가능!
  2. 닉네임 개수 선택 가능
  3. 닉네임 최대 글자 수 선택 가능
  4. 원하는 명사카테고리 선택 가능
  5. 간단하고 직관적인 인터페이스
  6. 오토레이아웃이 적용된 깔끔한 결과물



💡 사용 방법:

  1. 새 텍스트 생성: 옵션 선택 후 생성하면 자동으로 프레임 생성
  2. 기존 텍스트 변경: 텍스트 레이어 선택 후 옵션 적용


귀여운 이름 만들 땐, 이 플러그인만한 게 없죠! 지금 바로 사용해보세요! 😊

plugins.name: Quick Frames
plugins.description:
Quick Frames has a vast library of device frame sizes. Figma defaults are very limited and Figma does not allow users to create and save their own set of device screen resolutions. I just put down a collection so you don't have to google them every time.


Why Quick Frames?

Figma currently lacks built-in support for a comprehensive device frame library.


Why did I build this?

Because I was bored and wanted to build something. I remember sharing a feedback on figma community forum few years ago and its still pending. So decided to make one for it.


Note: This plugin will become useless if Figma decides to support this feature. Till then, enjoy using it.


Reach out to me on Linkedin if you with to connect with me to work on a plugin / share feedback / simply to network 😊

accepted.name: Renga R
accepted.description: Product Designer with a decade of exp in designing Products, Websites, Design Systems, User research, user interviews etc. I also code for fun.

plugins.name: Rename and Label
plugins.description:
This plug-in will provide 4 functions:

+Rename all frames in all pages with the following rules:

  • Prefix of the new name is the page's name
  • Horizontally aligned frames will have the suffix: A01, A02, A03 ...
  • Next group of Horizontally aligned frames will have the suffix: B01, A02, A03 ... and so on.

+Label all frames in all pages using the frame's name

+ Rename and then label the frame

+ Remove all the labels from the frames.


Note: if the top object of your frame is masked, the label will not show up.

plugins.name: Typography Style Guide Creator
plugins.description:
Typography Style Guide Creator is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers streamline their typography workflow by automatically generating text styles from existing designs. Stop manually recreating text styles and let this plugin do the heavy lifting.

With Typography Style Guide Creator, you can transform any frame containing text elements into a complete typography system that's integrated directly into your Figma styles. Simply select a frame with your text designs, run the plugin, and watch as your typography system comes to life.

Key Features


Instant Style Generation: Convert manually created text elements into reusable Figma text styles with one click

Smart Name Recognition: Uses your text layer names as style names for better organization

Duplicate Detection: Intelligently identifies and merges duplicate styles to keep your design system clean

Visual Style Preview: See all created styles in an intuitive interface before applying them

Seamless Integration: Styles are added directly to your Figma document's style library


How It Works


Select a Frame: Choose any frame containing your text elements

Name Your Layers: Ensure text layers have descriptive names (e.g., "Heading/H1", "Body/Regular")

Run the Plugin: Click "Create Styles" to generate your typography system

Done!: Your text styles are now available in your Figma document


Perfect For


Design teams establishing consistent typography systems

Designers converting existing designs into organized style guides

Design system maintainers looking to formalize typography rules

Anyone who wants to save time on manual style creation


Save Hours of Design Work

Typography Style Guide Creator eliminates the tedious process of manually creating and managing text styles. What would normally take hours can now be done in seconds, allowing you to focus on what matters most—designing great experiences.
plugins.tagline: Turn your text designs into organized typography styles with a single click

plugins.name: Spreadsheet to Figma
plugins.description:
Sync content from Google Sheets directly into your Figma file.


Step 1

Prepare your figma design. Aptly name your layers, cause they will be referenced by name in your spreadsheet!


Step 2

Prepare your google spreadsheet:

  1. reserve first row for headings
  2. each row will be a copy of the design


Each column name should be: layer_name.layer_property (examples: rectangle.fill, client.text)


Available properties:

  1. x : number
  2. y : number
  3. width : number
  4. height: number
  5. rotation: number
  6. fill : image url or hex color
  7. instance : component name
  8. text: string
  9. stroke_weight: number
  10. stroke_color: hex color
  11. hidden: boolean
  12. visible: boolean


Step 3

Make the spreadsheet public and copy the url


Step 4

  1. Open the plugin
  2. Paste the url
  3. Select the layer
  4. Smash that big orange button!


For support

Hit bbtgnn.net!
plugins.tagline: Easily merge spreadsheet data with any selection

plugins.name: Latest Comments
plugins.description:
🔸 What's New in V2


  1. [Optimize] redesign UI
  2. [Optimize] team ID form: now you can input both team link or team ID
  3. [New] a tutorial about how to get team link and figma token
  4. [New] select number of comments list: choose how many you want to list
  5. [New] customize comments format: make your format of comments list
  6. [New] a refresh button: you can get latest comment without reopen the plugin
  7. [New] double click to copy the comment: much easier to copy


🔸 Figma-latest-comments intro.


this plugin is used for listing the newest comments from the current figma file, and the result will display by the default format:


#@id @text
👉 @link


and you can customized the display format as you like:


  1. @id will be replaced by the comment id
  2. @text will be replaced by the comment text content
  3. @link will be replaced by the comment link
  4. @page will be replaced by the page name of the selected comment
  5. @time will be replaced by the comment created time
  6. @user will be replaced by the name of comment creator


it may simplify the handoff workflow of designer


---


🔸 V2 版本更新内容


  1. [优化] 重设计 UI
  2. [优化] 团队 ID 表单：现在你可以输入团队链接或团队 ID
  3. [新增] 一个关于如何获取团队链接和 Figma 令牌的教程
  4. [新增] 评论列表数量选择：选择你想列出的评论数量
  5. [新增] 自定义评论格式：自定义你的评论列表格式
  6. [新增] 刷新按钮：无需重新打开插件即可获取最新评论
  7. [新增] 双击复制评论：复制评论更加方便


🔸 Figma latest comments插件简介


这个插件用于列出当前 Figma 文件中的最新评论，默认的显示格式如下：


#@id @text
👉 @link


你也可以根据需要自定义显示格式：


  1. @id 会被替换为评论的 ID
  2. @text 会被替换为评论的文本内容
  3. @link 会被替换为评论的链接
  4. @page 会被替换成评论所在的 page 名

100703.name: Latest Comments
100703.description:
🔸 What's New in V2


  1. [Optimize] redesign UI
  2. [Optimize] team ID form: now you can input both team link or team ID
  3. [New] a tutorial about how to get team link and figma token
  4. [New] select number of comments list: choose how many you want to list
  5. [New] customize comments format: make your format of comments list
  6. [New] a refresh button: you can get latest comment without reopen the plugin
  7. [New] double click to copy the comment: much easier to copy


🔸 Figma-latest-comments intro.


this plugin is used for listing the newest comments from the current figma file, and the result will display by the default format:


#@id @text
👉 @link


and you can customized the display format as you like:


  1. @id will be replaced by the comment id
  2. @text will be replaced by the comment text content
  3. @link will be replaced by the comment link
  4. @page will be replaced by the page name of the selected comment
  5. @time will be replaced by the comment created time
  6. @user will be replaced by the name of comment creator


it may simplify the handoff workflow of designer


---


🔸 V2 版本更新内容


  1. [优化] 重设计 UI
  2. [优化] 团队 ID 表单：现在你可以输入团队链接或团队 ID
  3. [新增] 一个关于如何获取团队链接和 Figma 令牌的教程
  4. [新增] 评论列表数量选择：选择你想列出的评论数量
  5. [新增] 自定义评论格式：自定义你的评论列表格式
  6. [新增] 刷新按钮：无需重新打开插件即可获取最新评论
  7. [新增] 双击复制评论：复制评论更加方便


🔸 Figma latest comments插件简介


这个插件用于列出当前 Figma 文件中的最新评论，默认的显示格式如下：


#@id @text
👉 @link


你也可以根据需要自定义显示格式：


  1. @id 会被替换为评论的 ID
  2. @text 会被替换为评论的文本内容
  3. @link 会被替换为评论的链接
  4. @page 会被替换成评论所在的 page 名
  5. @time 会被替换成评论时间
  6. @user 会被替换成评论者用户名


这可以简化设计师的交接工作流程。

This, to allow you to create 2D animation with a Stop Motion technique.

plugins.name: Square Wrap
plugins.description:
How to Use

  1. Arrange the images on Figma.
  2. Select all the arranged images.
  3. Run the plugin and press the button.
  4. All selected images will be wrapped in square frames.
plugins.tagline: This plugin can wrap images of varying widths and heights in square frames.
